item.title: RICHARDSON ELECTRONICS LTD 10-K
item.description: RICHARDSON ELECTRONICS LTD, which is in the Wholesale-Electronic Parts & Equipment, Nec [5065] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 01, 2022 had 21998 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
